metric.name: Number of instructions
metric.description: Total number of byte code instructions of a class file aggregated for the measured element

metric.name: Average component dependency (ACD)
metric.description: Average number of components (source files) a component (source file) depends on directly and indirectly. This metric can be used to characterize the overall average coupling of project internal components (source files)

metric.name: Normalized cumulative component dependency (NCCD)
metric.description: The ratio between the cumulative component dependency of a project and the cumulative component dependency of a balanced binary tree of the same size. A value greater than 1 indicates a more vertical design. A value less than 1 indicates a more horizontal design.

metric.name: Number of internal packages
metric.description: Total number of internal packages contained in a project or system

metric.name: Number of cyclic packages
metric.description: Total number of cyclically coupled packages contained in a project

metric.name: Structural erosion - type level
metric.description: Number of type dependencies that must be cut in order to remove all package cycles in a project (this is not always the exact minimum number, but a heuristic-based guess)

metric.name: Structural erosion - reference level
metric.description: Number of code references that must be removed in order to remove all package cycles in a project (this is not always the exact minimum number, but a heuristic-based guess)

metric.name: Number of Java source files (non-excluded)
metric.description: Total number of Java source files contained in the measured element; all files are counted which contain at least one non-excluded type
